display_long_description:
We will add English and Chinese support in a future update.
Please wait for the update if you wish to play in any language other than Japanese.

# Features
"KAMITSUBAKI CITY VIRTUAL REALITY" is a dark-fantasy science fiction VR adventure game taking place in "Kamitsubaki City."
Its fully-voiced characters are brought to life alongside the world with their own unique 3D models.
The game features numerous popular songs from Kamitsubaki's vocal artists that link to the plot, granting the player an ever greater level of immersion with the world around them.


The player's choices weave the story in vastly different directions.
Dive into the world of Kamitsubaki City and take part in the most extensive story in the series that cuts straight to the heart of Kamitsubaki City.


## This game and "KAMITSUBAKI CITY REGENERATE" share the same basic story. Furthermore, the story is standalone, meaning those unfamiliar with the series can play these games with no worries.

# What is the "Kamitsubaki City Under Construction." series?
KAMITSUBAKI An original IP project by KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO in development since 2019.
One of multiple story projects whose lore is linked to the studio's vocal artists, starting with tales centered around the parallel world of Kamitsubaki City.

# Cast
* Kafu Morisaki: KAF
* Rime Tanioki: RIM
* Haru Asanushi: Harusaruhi
* Sekai Yorukawa: Isekaijoucho
* Koko Rinne: KOKO
